nodes.text: Ambrian cheroots were a type of narcotic that were designed to be lit and inhaled, much in the same method used to absorb the effects of different types of spice. Cheroots produced a pleasant, calming sensation in those who smoked them. However, the narcotic was known to cause health problems in those who indulged in it. The cheroot produced a thick, pink, herbal smoke. The Besalisk cook Dexter Jettster smoked Ambrian cheeroots during the Clone Wars, although his friend, Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, advised him against it.

Ambrian cheroots first appeared in The Clone Wars: Wild Space, a novel written by Karen Miller. The Clone Wars: Wild Space was published in 2008. Although a planet called Ambria exists in Star Wars universe, it was not stated in Wild Space that the cheroots came from Ambria.
